item.title: How to set up DNS for Netlify on Godaddy
item.description: Easy way to setup and configure DNS on godaddy to be used by netlify for custome domain setting. Once your website is deployed and ready on netlify, copy the name netlify server name (url where it is hosted by netlify). It should be something like youthful-villani-10bc56.netlify.com Log in and open godaddy console -> Manage DNS for your selection and then add the following A and CNAME records Type Name Value A @ 104.
